ValidationRule.description: Ensures the Action's 'Hours Scheduled Value (Billable) does not exceed the Milestone's Unallocated Milestone Budget - applies only for Fixed Price Projects.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( amc__Milestone__r.amc__Project__r.amc__Billing_Type__c , "Fixed Price") ,
IF(ISCHANGED(amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c), (amc__Milestone__r.amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c - PRIORVALUE(amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c)) + amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c, amc__Milestone__r.amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c)
> amc__Milestone__r.amc__Milestone_Budget__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Action will exceed the 'Milestone Budget', please reduce the Hours Scheduled (Billable)
